ion Bellec <m.bellec@christofle.com>; Akiko Otsuka <a.otsuka@christofle.com>
Objet : RE: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Dear Pauline,

 

I would like to add something.

 

When we met with AIG team for 2024 settlement and 2025 payment, they told us we have to pay whole 2024 yearly amount and 2025 prepayment.

It would be helpful if the worldwide transportation insurance covers Japan.

 

Also, our incoterms contract is CIF, so the insurance % or amount should be informed to forwarder for custom clearance.

We just had the investigation by customs last year and it would be trouble if we cannot provide the insurance information.

 

Thank you very much for your help.

 

Best regards,

Yoshiko Kusano

From: David Monteiro <d.monteiro@christofle.com <mailto:d.monteiro@christofle.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 8:43 PM
To: 

Subject: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Chers collègues,

Je vous adresse ce message pour vous rappeler une directive importante concernant la souscription d'assurances transport avec nos transporteurs habituels.

Il a été constaté que certaines équipes continuent de souscrire des assurances transport, en particulier lors des demandes d'étiquettes auprès de Chronopost, FedEx et DHL. Nous souhaitons vous rappeler qu'il est strictement interdit de souscrire à ce type d'assurance, car le Groupe Chalhoub dispose déjà d'une couverture d'assurance transport complète, qui s'applique à toutes nos opérations.

Je vous joins à cet email une note expliquant plus en détail la situation. Nous vous prions de la lire attentivement et de veiller à ce qu'aucune souscription supplémentaire ne soit effectuée.

Pour toute question ou clarification, n’hésitez pas à contacter notre responsable logistique ou le service juridique.

Merci de votre compréhension et de votre coopération.

 

**************************************English version: **************************************

Dear colleagues,

 

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

 

It has been noted that some teams continue to take out transport insurance, particularly when requesting labels from Chronopost, FedEx and DHL. We would like to remind you that it is strictly forbidden to take out this type of insurance, as the Chalhoub Group already has full transport insurance cover, which applies to all our operations.

 

I am enclosing a note explaining the situation in more detail. Please read it carefully and ensure that no additional underwriting is undertaken.

 

If you have any questions or require clarification, please do not hesitate to contact our logistics manager or the Legal Department.

 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

 

 

BR,

 

David Monteiro
Logistics project manager


Christofle | In Rhénus Logistic, 7 rue de chennevièrre, 76320 Cdc les Elbeufs | France
Mob. : + 33 6 33 30 51 46

Subject: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance***** 

 

Bonjour David,

 

En ce qui concerne les assurances transport, j’ai un peu de questions :

 

Nous aurions une photocopie du contrat d’assurance ?

En cas d’accident, comment nous déclarons ?  Il y a la limitation de responsabilité ?

Pour le frais d’assurance, Christofle Japon paye à OC ?

 

Je te remercie beaucoup d’avance.

 

Cordialement,

----------------------------

From: David Monteiro <d.monteiro@christofle.com <mailto:d.monteiro@christofle.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 8:43 PM
To: 

Subject: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Chers collègues,

Je vous adresse ce message pour vous rappeler une directive importante concernant la souscription d'assurances transport avec nos transporteurs habituels.

Il a été constaté que certaines équipes continuent de souscrire des assurances transport, en particulier lors des demandes d'étiquettes auprès de Chronopost, FedEx et DHL. Nous souhaitons vous rappeler qu'il est strictement interdit de souscrire à ce type d'assurance, car le Groupe Chalhoub dispose déjà d'une couverture d'assurance transport complète, qui s'applique à toutes nos opérations.

Je vous joins à cet email une note expliquant plus en détail la situation. Nous vous prions de la lire attentivement et de veiller à ce qu'aucune souscription supplémentaire ne soit effectuée.

Pour toute question ou clarification, n’hésitez pas à contacter notre responsable logistique ou le service juridique.

Merci de votre compréhension et de votre coopération.

 

**************************************English version: **************************************

Dear colleagues,

 

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

 

It has been noted that some teams continue to take out transport insurance, particularly when requesting labels from Chronopost, FedEx and DHL. We would like to remind you that it is strictly forbidden to take out this type of insurance, as the Chalhoub Group already has full transport insurance cover, which applies to all our operations.

 

I am enclosing a note explaining the situation in more detail. Please read it carefully and ensure that no additional underwriting is undertaken.

 

If you have any questions or require clarification, please do not hesitate to contact our logistics manager or the Legal Department.

 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

 

 

BR,

 

David Monteiro
Logistics project manager

From: David Monteiro <d.monteiro@christofle.com <mailto:d.monteiro@christofle.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 8:43 PM
To: 

Subject: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Chers collègues,

Je vous adresse ce message pour vous rappeler une directive importante concernant la souscription d'assurances transport avec nos transporteurs habituels.

Il a été constaté que certaines équipes continuent de souscrire des assurances transport, en particulier lors des demandes d'étiquettes auprès de Chronopost, FedEx et DHL. Nous souhaitons vous rappeler qu'il est strictement interdit de souscrire à ce type d'assurance, car le Groupe Chalhoub dispose déjà d'une couverture d'assurance transport complète, qui s'applique à toutes nos opérations.

Je vous joins à cet email une note expliquant plus en détail la situation. Nous vous prions de la lire attentivement et de veiller à ce qu'aucune souscription supplémentaire ne soit effectuée.

Pour toute question ou clarification, n’hésitez pas à contacter notre responsable logistique ou le service juridique.

Merci de votre compréhension et de votre coopération.

 

**************************************English version: **************************************

Dear colleagues,

 

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

chunks.text:
I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

 

It has been noted that some teams continue to take out transport insurance, particularly when requesting labels from Chronopost, FedEx and DHL. We would like to remind you that it is strictly forbidden to take out this type of insurance, as the Chalhoub Group already has full transport insurance cover, which applies to all our operations.

 

I am enclosing a note explaining the situation in more detail. Please read it carefully and ensure that no additional underwriting is undertaken.

 

If you have any questions or require clarification, please do not hesitate to contact our logistics manager or the Legal Department.

 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

 

 

BR,

 

David Monteiro
Logistics project manager

--------------------------------------------------
Dear Yoshiko,

 

Apologies for any delay in response.

 

Please note that the marine insurance for Christofle Japan is duly included in the master policy both for domestic and international shipments. 

 

For claims:

*	An excess deductible of EUR 250 applies per loss for both imports/exports for all modes of transit (Land/Sea/Air).
*	Any loss declaration will be direct to the Nasco Gulf team in Dubai. 
*	For any respective claim settlements, the payment will be made to MCT FZE which will, it turn, make an equivalent transfer to Christofle Japan upon receipt.

 

Similarly, the premium is paid by MCT FZE and reinvoiced to the Chritofle entities proportionally based on the insured values of the respective Christofle entities.

chunks.text:
Similarly, the premium is paid by MCT FZE and reinvoiced to the Chritofle entities proportionally based on the insured values of the respective Christofle entities.

 

The marine insurance premium is based on the estimated annual shipments value adjusted at a rate of 0.125% of the cost value of the shipments. We have defined the estimated annual shipment value as 50% the entity turnover in order to avoid monthly declarations requirement for imports/exports.

 

The insurer can provide you with a certificate for an open cover for all imports/exports of Chritofle Japan from 02/01/2025 to 01/01/2026 which you can share with the relevant customs authorities. 

 

However, note that the certificate will be issued by Nasco Gulf / Ittihad Al-Watani from UAE. Please check and advise if AIG was providing local documentation for customs purposes issued from Japanese insurance companies to verify. If needed, we can request the insurer to arrange for a fronting partner to issue the necessary certificates for customs clearance purposes. However, it would be at additional cost.

 

Attached is the renewed policy with the full details of cover. Trust the above clarifies and remain at your disposal should you require any further details.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

From: David Monteiro <d.monteiro@christofle.com <mailto:d.monteiro@christofle.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 8:43 PM
To: 

Subject: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Chers collègues,

Je vous adresse ce message pour vous rappeler une directive importante concernant la souscription d'assurances transport avec nos transporteurs habituels.

Il a été constaté que certaines équipes continuent de souscrire des assurances transport, en particulier lors des demandes d'étiquettes auprès de Chronopost, FedEx et DHL. Nous souhaitons vous rappeler qu'il est strictement interdit de souscrire à ce type d'assurance, car le Groupe Chalhoub dispose déjà d'une couverture d'assurance transport complète, qui s'applique à toutes nos opérations.

Je vous joins à cet email une note expliquant plus en détail la situation. Nous vous prions de la lire attentivement et de veiller à ce qu'aucune souscription supplémentaire ne soit effectuée.

Pour toute question ou clarification, n’hésitez pas à contacter notre responsable logistique ou le service juridique.

Merci de votre compréhension et de votre coopération.

 

**************************************English version: **************************************

Dear colleagues,

 

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

I am sending you this message to remind you of an important directive concerning the purchase of transport insurance with our usual carriers.

 

It has been noted that some teams continue to take out transport insurance, particularly when requesting labels from Chronopost, FedEx and DHL. We would like to remind you that it is strictly forbidden to take out this type of insurance, as the Chalhoub Group already has full transport insurance cover, which applies to all our operations.

 

I am enclosing a note explaining the situation in more detail. Please read it carefully and ensure that no additional underwriting is undertaken.

 

If you have any questions or require clarification, please do not hesitate to contact our logistics manager or the Legal Department.

 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

 

 

BR,

 

David Monteiro
Logistics project manager

Dear Hagop

 

Thank you very much for sending the policy.

It is different from AIG local insurance and today is AIG due date.  

So, at this moment we think it is better to be included into global insurance for now.

After 1 year, we would like to review again.

 

Please let us know if we need to submit any information from our side to be included into master policy.

 

I would like to ask some questions.

I would like to ask some questions.  

1.	What is the premium of the total insurance cost?  (0.125% on cost for oversea insurance and all other included)
2.	Is there any insurance covering domestic transportation (for example, from warehouse to stores)?
3.	There is no insurance for spot family sales or POPUP event stores, correct?  
4.	No insurance for earthquake, correct?

 

For custom clearance matter, we will check with forwarders.

 

Yoshiko Kusano

Christofle Japan

2F, 5-10-6, Minami-Aoyama, Minato-ku, 107-0062, Japan

080-4367-8056

 

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Cc: Chloé Benyahia <c.benyahia@christofle.com>; Marion Bellec <m.bellec@christofle.com>; Akiko Otsuka <a.otsuka@christofle.com>; Arthur Bernardaud <a.bernardaud@christofle.com>; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance***** VERY URGENT

 

Dear Yoshiko,

 

Apologies for any delay in response.

 

Please note that the marine insurance for Christofle Japan is duly included in the master policy both for domestic and international shipments. 

 

For claims:

*	An excess deductible of EUR 250 applies per loss for both imports/exports for all modes of transit (Land/Sea/Air).
*	Any loss declaration will be direct to the Nasco Gulf team in Dubai. 
*	For any respective claim settlements, the payment will be made to MCT FZE which will, it turn, make an equivalent transfer to Christofle Japan upon receipt.

chunks.text:
*	For any respective claim settlements, the payment will be made to MCT FZE which will, it turn, make an equivalent transfer to Christofle Japan upon receipt.

 

Similarly, the premium is paid by MCT FZE and reinvoiced to the Chritofle entities proportionally based on the insured values of the respective Christofle entities.

 

The marine insurance premium is based on the estimated annual shipments value adjusted at a rate of 0.125% of the cost value of the shipments. We have defined the estimated annual shipment value as 50% the entity turnover in order to avoid monthly declarations requirement for imports/exports.

 

The insurer can provide you with a certificate for an open cover for all imports/exports of Chritofle Japan from 02/01/2025 to 01/01/2026 which you can share with the relevant customs authorities. 

 

However, note that the certificate will be issued by Nasco Gulf / Ittihad Al-Watani from UAE. Please check and advise if AIG was providing local documentation for customs purposes issued from Japanese insurance companies to verify. If needed, we can request the insurer to arrange for a fronting partner to issue the necessary certificates for customs clearance purposes. However, it would be at additional cost.

 

Attached is the renewed policy with the full details of cover. Trust the above clarifies and remain at your disposal should you require any further details.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  : please also confirm that our affiliate in Japan is duly included in our worldwide transportation insurance (domestic and international).

Could you please explain the procedure to follow in case of claim and the amount of the deductible.

Envoyé : mercredi 29 janvier 2025 10:44
À : Pauline Battini <p.battini@christofle.com <mailto:p.battini@christofle.com> >; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >

Objet : RE: *****Rappel important concernant les assurances transport / Important reminder about transport insurance*****

 

Dear Pauline,

 

I would like to add something.

 

When we met with AIG team for 2024 settlement and 2025 payment, they told us we have to pay whole 2024 yearly amount and 2025 prepayment.

It would be helpful if the worldwide transportation insurance covers Japan.

 

Also, our incoterms contract is CIF, so the insurance % or amount should be informed to forwarder for custom clearance.

We just had the investigation by customs last year and it would be trouble if we cannot provide the insurance information.
